name: The Graven Icon of Vingt Cinq
data: It increases the users constitution phenomenally.
It has awesome armour class for its type (poor in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration unbelievably much.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users shadow resistance tremendously.
It increases the users physical resistance tremendously.
The icon can be inlaid with up to three shards.
The icon is the bane of all undeads.
The icon imbues its owner with great stamina.
